definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
young deer antler prior to ossification (used in TCM)
matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
ginseng and young deer antler (used in TCM)
himematsutake mushroom (Agaricus subrufescens or Agaricus blazei Murill)
lush/luxuriant (of grass or hair)/soft lush hair

sentences.english: Skin lotus root. Wash and grate. Then mix it with seasoning 2.
sentences.chinese: 莲藕去皮洗净磨成茸，加调味搅匀。

sentences.english: Add chopped garlic and seasoning. Cook for a while. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 加入蒜茸和调味料，煮片刻，盛起，即可品尝。

sentences.english: For better texture, strawberries can be cut into small cube instead of blend into paste.
sentences.chinese: 想雪糕更有口感，可将士多啤梨切幼粒而不搅成茸。

sentences.english: Stuffed fish ball is one of the characteristic delicacies among the colloid products of minced fish.
sentences.chinese: 灌馅鱼圆是鱼茸胶体制品中别具特色的美味佳肴。

sentences.english: In a separate bowl, mix pumpkin puree and rice milk together.
sentences.chinese: 另用一个碗混匀南瓜茸和米汤。

sentences.english: Would you like steamed fish or steamed shrimps with garlic?No, none of them.
sentences.chinese: 你想食用清蒸鱼还是蒜茸蒸虾？

sentences.english: Heat up wok, add in a little oil, stir fry minced garlic till fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 烧热锅，加入少许油，炒香蒜茸。

sentences.english: Heat up some oil in the wok to fry the fermented black bean and minced garlic, leave to cool…
sentences.chinese: 豆豉先用少许油炒香，后加入蒜茸爆香后，取出待用。

definition: (of a male) to come of age/an adult male
donko shiitake mushroom, a prized type of shiitake (Lentinula edodes) cultivated in winter, with thick flesh and partially open cap
